database

Class ProductDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.ProductDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductDAO

    public class ProductDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductDAO
    This class provides the implementation of the methods available to create, get and update Products and Prices. Methods are specified in ProductDAO. It uses DBConnection.
    Author:
    oscar

      • getProducts

        public Product[] getProducts(float minPrice,
                             float maxPrice,
                             boolean discontinued,
                             java.lang.String filter)
        Description copied from interface: ProductDAO
        Retrieves the products (up to a max, if the array returned is max there may be results not listed) with the specified search criteria. The filter search if every word introduced by the user is contained in any of the following: The product id, name or description.
        Specified by:
        getProducts in interface ProductDAO
        Parameters:
        minPrice - The minimum current price
        maxPrice - The maximum current price
        discontinued - If it is true, will show currently discontinued products
        filter - The words to find
        Returns:
        array of products

      • newProductId

        public int newProductId()
        Description copied from interface: ProductDAO
        Returns a high number (from 9000 to 9999) available to insert a new product.
        Specified by:
        newProductId in interface ProductDAO
        Returns:
        A productId not used
